  • Description: Shipment was stated to be clothes. When putting shipment through the x-ray, there was a lot of clutter and had to open up the tote. There was a mix of clothes and household items, then found a single BIC lighter at the very bottom of the tote.

item.title: Report X-2025021220
item.description:
Report X-2025021220

Identified by scraper @ 2025-03-01T21:20:14+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2025-02-17
  • City: REDMOND
  • State: WA
  • Report Type: Undeclared Shipment with no Release
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: UNITED PARCEL SERVICE CO
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: THIS PKG WAS LEAKED ON BY ANOTHER PKG. RESPONDER OPENED THIS BOX TO REPACKAGE IT. THIS IS A REUSED AMAZON BOX. IT CONTAINS TWO INNER BOXES WITH TWO 4L CYLINDERS OF NITROUS OXIDE. THE INNER BOXES ARE MARKED WITH THREE DIAMOND HAZ MAT LABELS: CLASS 2 NON FLAMMABLE GAS, 5.1 OXIDIZER, AND A SMALLER CLASS 2 INHALATION HAZARD. INNER BOXES ARE ALSO MARKED WITH UN1070. CYLINDERS ARE NOT DAMAGED OR LEAKING. OUTER BOX HAD NO HAZ MAT MARKINGS.
